headline: Liberty Broadband Preferreds Will Become Even More Attractive Than Charter Communications Preferreds
summary: Liberty Broadband preferreds will be replaced by Charter Communications preferreds by 2027. Learn why LBRDP stock offers a 7.3% yield and low risk opportunity.
